description: This table supplements the EPISODE table. It contains additional information about episodes. When a provider sees a patient several times for an ongoing condition, such as prenatal care, these encounters can be linked to a single Episode of Care.

columns.name: EPISODE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the episode of care record. NOTE: This table is filtered to include only non-inpatient episodes. Inpatient episode data can be found in the table IP_EPISODE_LINK (first released with system 2002).

columns.name: DEPT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the department primarily responsible for managing the episode.

columns.name: RXENROLL_LAST_EDIT_USER_ID
columns.description: The user ID for whoever last updated the pharmacy enrollment.

columns.name: RXENROLL_LAST_EDIT_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time the pharmacy enrollment was last updated.

columns.name: ENROLL_PROG_C_NAME
columns.description:
The current enrollment program for the pharmacy.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: RXENROLL_NOTE_ID
columns.description: Summary note documented on this episode

columns.name: RXENROLL_ENROLLMENT_DATE
columns.description: The date the patient was enrolled in the program

columns.name: RXENROLL_DISENROLL_DATE
columns.description: The date the patient was unenrolled from the program.

columns.name: RXENROLL_DECLINE_DATE
columns.description: The date the patient was declined enrollment (or declined to enroll) in the program

columns.name: RXENROLL_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The current enrollment status


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Under Review


Enrolled


Disenrolled


Declined


Deleted

columns.name: CRT_PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The patient contact serial number that auto created this episode.

columns.name: CMGMT_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the status of the case episode.  Enrolling - The manager is working to enroll the patient in a case management program. Open - The manager is performing ongoing outreach with the patient. Closed - The patient is no longer enrolled in case management, or they opted out of case management.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Enrolling


Active


Closed


Paused


Declined

columns.name: CMGMT_SENSITIVITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Store the sensitivity flag for security restricted case episodes. If your organization has implemented break-the-glass, this sensitivity flag can be used to restrict access to the case episode.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: CMGMT_ENROLLMENT_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the reason the patient was enrolled in case management.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Referred by provider


Identified as high-risk


Self-enrolled


Identified using claims or encounter data


Identified using hospital discharge data


Identified using pharmacy data


Identified using UM data


Identified using referral data

columns.name: CMGMT_ENROLLING_STEP_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the enrolling step that specifies the current step of enrollment for the case episode.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Not specified


Identified

columns.name: CMGMT_CLOSED_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the reason the case episode is closed.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Not specified


Patient declined case management


Patient graduated


Unable to reach patient

columns.name: ENROLL_ID
columns.description: The research study-patient association (LAR) record ID for this episode.

columns.name: PREG_CHORIONIC_C_NAME
columns.description:
For a pregnancy with multiple fetuses, indicates if the fetuses have individual or a shared chorionic and amniotic sacs.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Mono-Mono


Mono-Di


Di-Di


Other


Mono-Tri


Di-Tri


Tri-Tri

columns.name: PLAN_ADOPT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item indicates if the mother plans to give the baby up for adoption and if so, what type of adoption or arrangement is planned. 


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Open Adoption


Closed Adoption


Surrogate


Safe Surrender


Gestational Carrier


Hide Mother's Info


Not Applicable

columns.name: SUSPECTED_FD_YN
columns.description:
This item indicates whether a suspected fetal demise has occurred in the pregnancy. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: PLAN_CIRCUMCISION_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item is used to indicate whether the parents have requested a circumcision after the baby is born.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Provider Performed


Ritual

columns.name: PLAN_DELIVER_BY_GA
columns.description: This item represents the gestational age (in weeks of pregnancy) at when the patient and provider expect the delivery to occur.

columns.name: PLAN_DEL_METHOD_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item captures the planned method of delivery as documented prior to labor.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Vaginal


C-Section


TOLAC

columns.name: CMGMT_DECLINE_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
Documents the reason a patient/client refused coordinated case management services.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: HSPC_ADD_DISCUSSED_WITH_PAT_YN
columns.description:
This item indicates whether or not a hospice election addendum was discussed with the patient for this episode.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: SUSPECTED_FD_YN

columns.name: HSPC_ADD_REQUESTED_WITH_PAT_YN
columns.description:
This item indicates whether or not a hospice election addendum was requested for this episode.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: SUSPECTED_FD_YN

columns.name: HSPC_ADD_DISCUSSED_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique user record ID that is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EMP table.

columns.name: HSPC_ADD_DISCUSSED_DATE
columns.description: The date the addendum was discussed with the patient.

columns.name: CMGMT_ENROLL_DATE
columns.description: Documents the enrollment date, which is the date on which a patient or client's status becomes active and the patient or client starts receiving Coordinated Care Management services. Refer to CMGMT_CALC_ENROLL_DATE for more robust reporting.

columns.name: CMGMT_ENROLL_CALC_DATE
columns.description: This virtual item contains a calculated enrollment date determined from the user- documented enrollment date (CMGMT_ENROLL_DATE, HSB-18030) or the Case Management History related group (I HSB 18400).  If the overall episode status (CMGMT_STATUS_C, I HSB 18010) is 1-Enrolling, the value will be blank.  If the overall status is anything besides 1-Enrolling, the value will be set to the user- documented Enrollment Date, if it exists. Otherwise, the value will be set to the date (ACTION_UTC_DTTM) the status (ASSOC_CMGMT_STATUS_C) originally changed to 2-Active, unless the status was changed to 1-Enrolling more recently.

columns.name: CMGMT_TRIGGERING_CLASSIFIER_ID
columns.description: The classifier (CFR record) that triggered the creation of this case.

columns.name: CMGMT_TRIGGERING_CLASSIFIER_ID_CLASSIFIER_NAME
columns.description: The title of the classifier record.

columns.name: CMGMT_TRIGGERING_CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The claim that caused the creation of this case.

columns.name: PREG_CORD_BLOOD_PLANS_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item indicates the patient's plans for umbilical cord blood.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


See Overview


Do Not Collect


Research Study


Public Bank


Private Bank


Internal Bank


Internal Lab

columns.name: LINKED_SERVICE_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The service plan associated with this episode.
